
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/chenshibao/p/18822691" title="发布于 2025-04-13 10:38">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Deepseek的几款好看的交互界面</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h2 id="1page-assist-浏览器插件">1.Page Assist 浏览器插件</h2>
<h3 id="11-开源地址">1.1 开源地址</h3>
<p><a href="https://github.com/n4ze3m/page-assist" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/n4ze3m/page-assist</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412223338906-2132390416.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="12-下载安装">1.2 下载安装</h3>
<p>可以到GitHub 下载</p>
<p>插件支持主流浏览器，edge、chrome、firefox</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/n4ze3m/page-assist/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/n4ze3m/page-assist/releases</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412223454006-1360313218.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>可以到谷歌插件市场下载安装（需要魔法上网）<br>
上面两种方法都下载不了的小伙伴到如下地址下载<br>
<a href="https://www.crxsoso.com/webstore/detail/jfgfiigpkhlkbnfnbobbkinehhfdhndo" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.crxsoso.com/webstore/detail/jfgfiigpkhlkbnfnbobbkinehhfdhndo</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412223554897-2027489349.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>运行效果</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412223615159-917274694.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="2open-webui">2.Open WebUI</h2>
<p>Open WebUI 是一个可扩展的、功能丰富、用户友好的自托管 AI 平台，专为完全离线运行而设计。它支持多种 LLM 运行环境，包括 Ollama 和 OpenAI 兼容的 API，并内置了用于 RAG 的推理引擎，是一个强大的 AI 部署解决方案。</p>
<h3 id="21-开源地址">2.1 开源地址</h3>
<p><a href="https://github.com/open-webui/open-webui" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/open-webui/open-webui</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412223735680-538914318.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="22-下载安装">2.2 下载安装</h3>
<p>需要使用docker安装，小伙伴们可以参考下面中文官方文档安装</p>
<p><a href="https://openwebui-doc-zh.pages.dev/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://openwebui-doc-zh.pages.dev/</a></p>
<p>运行效果</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412223846017-662364818.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="3chatbox">3.chatbox</h2>
<p>1、开源地址</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/Bin-Huang/chatbox" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/Bin-Huang/chatbox</a></p>
<p>2、下载安装</p>
<p>可以通过官网下载</p>
<p><a href="https://chatboxai.app/zh#download" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://chatboxai.app/zh#download</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412223947982-903598262.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>支持桌面应用和移动应用</p>
<p>也可以到GitHub 下载</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/Bin-Huang/chatbox/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/Bin-Huang/chatbox/releases</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412224021025-247817111.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>3、运行效果</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412224107422-879633492.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="4nextchat">4.NextChat</h2>
<p>1、开源地址</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/NextChat" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/NextChat</a></p>
<p>2、下载安装</p>
<p>可在GitHub 下载即可，或者直接使用网页版本。</p>
<p>GitHub下载地址：<a href="https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/NextChat/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/NextChat/releases</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412224217711-1273228078.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>3、运行效果</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412224252732-183698090.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412224309716-727288688.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="5-anything-llm">5. anything-llm</h2>
<p>1、开源地址<br>
<a href="https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm</a></p>
<p>2、下载安装<br>
GitHub 下载</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm/releases" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm/releases</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412224416413-1056844640.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>anythingllm 官网下载</p>
<p><a href="https://anythingllm.com/desktop" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://anythingllm.com/desktop</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412224439041-1190970301.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>3、运行效果</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2212230/202504/2212230-20250412224503728-1473463293.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>文档参考：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/p/18718693" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/xiezhr/p/18718693</a></p>
